I’m Mark. Just someone who likes to do whatever he wants, and create be the best version of it practising it. So guess what I’m practising, I’m doing things online. My main focus is the online developments of ecommerce. I’m allready active for the last 10 years on the internet and co-founded some ecommerce shops in the Netherlands. I’m also a fan of going to the gym to get some inspiration and dicipline that I can use in my daily profession.
